==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|代|替}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|だいたい}}

{{ja-noun|だいがえ}}

# [[substitution]]

====Alternative forms====
* [[代替え]] ([[だいがえ]] only)

====Usage notes====
* ''daitai'' is a more common pronunciation than ''daigae''
* '''代替''' is more commonly used than [[代替え]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* [[代替品]] (''daitaihin'', ''daigaehin''): substitute article, back-up
* [[代替機]] (''daitaiki''): substitute device, replacement aircraft
* [[代替物]] (''daitaibutsu''): substitute article
* [[代替クラス]] (''daitai kurasu'', ''daigae kurasu''): alternative class
* [[代替エネルギー]] (''daitai enerugī''): alternative energy
* [[代替パス]] (''daitai pasu'', ''daigae pasu''): alternate path
{{mid2}}
* [[代替トラック]] (''daitai torakku''): alternate track
* [[代替フロン]] (''daitai furon''): alternative CFCs
* [[代替療法]] (''daitai ryōhō'', ''daigae ryōhō''): alternative therapy
* [[代替医療]] (''daitai iryō''): alternative medicine
* [[代替効果]] (''daitai kōka''): substitution effect
* [[代替手段]] (''daitai shudan''): alternative means
{{bottom}}

====Related terms====
* [[代替わり]], [[代替り]] (''daigawari''): taking over, subrogation
